channel.title: Jungle - Jonny Hilstrom [Remixable] - Feedback? More to be added?

item.title: Jungle - Jonny Hilstrom [Remixable] - Feedback? More to be added?
item.dc:creator: Jonnyhillstrom
item.description:
Awesome man! That would work perfect! I can just chop them up and lay them out accordingly This is great cuz I do all my work off my phone as of right now so I was wondering how I was going to sample the sounds without recording them on my phone. Thankyou man! I’ll mess with it and upload a layered version! Cheers man​:blush:

Read full topic
item.source: Jungle - Jonny Hilstrom [Remixable] - Feedback? More to be added?

item.title: Jungle - Jonny Hilstrom [Remixable] - Feedback? More to be added?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
For what it’s worth, the latest GarageBand on iOS update added the Toybox soundpack which includes a good handful of environmental loops, rain and forest included I am pretty sure! Best thing about those is that unless they are time based samples they’ll stretch to tempo accordingly (off top of my head I can’t remember what loop type they are)

Edit: They all appear to be timed samples (ie they won’t stretch), but you still could use them, layer them up creatively and I’m certain it would work or just go to a free sound site

Read full topic

item.title: Jungle - Jonny Hilstrom [Remixable] - Feedback? More to be added?
item.dc:creator: paxman
item.description:
I like it. The coconut melodic percussion was a good choice, it sounds so tropical (which works with your jungle theme), and rightly so.
Maybe you could add samples? “Jungle noises” or “rainforest noises” from YouTube, even monkey noises would probably add to the jungle theme.

Read full topic
